channel.title: Small error please help

item.title: Small error please help
item.dc:creator: @tigman9 tigman9
item.description:
@tigman9 wrote:

when I post this code in itemclick2 i get the error below, i dont really understand why because it works when I put it in itemclick3, but thats the wrong option, and the option i want to put this on is supposed to be itemclick2, if anyone can help it would be awesome. thanks

case 13281: c.sendMessage("I must slay another " + c.taskAmount + " " + Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(c.slayerTask) + "."); break;

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:29: error: package Server does
not exist
c.sendMessage("I must slay another " + c.taskAmount + "
" + Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(c.slayerTask) + “.”);

      ^[/code]

Read full topic
